hints.content:
$\begin{align}
\purple{3+2}&\purple{=5+1}\\
\purple{5}&\purple{=6}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $5$ is not the same as $6$.

$\begin{align}
\pink{4+4}&\pink{=2+5}\\
\pink{8}&\pink{=7}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $8$ is not the same as $7$.

$\begin{align}
\blue{3+3}&\blue{=2+4}\\
\blue{6}&\blue{=6}\\
\end{align}$  
This is true because $6$ is the same as $6$.
